mapper.update: update cw_bank_account_info set PAY_NAME = #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ID = #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUBBRANCH = #{subbranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATETIME = now(), UPDATEIP = #{updateip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, PAY_NAME, BANK_ID, SUBBRANCH, CARD_NO, STATUS, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEIP from cw_bank_account_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, PAY_NAME, BANK_ID, SUBBRANCH, CARD_NO, STATUS, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEIP from cw_bank_account_info
